Text: Are we suposed to guess what this is?
Appears to be "The Godzilla Power Hour", whatever that might be :)
For info about this show, check out: http://www.tv.com/the-godzilla-power-hour/show/4928/summary.html?full_summary=1&tag=showspace_links;full_summary

How thankful we are that gojira55 didn't clutter up the page with this information so we could use what little bandwith we have to download a 600 Mb file to find out that it contains a completey assenine kids show!
